about_the_game:
Catch ‘em. Breed ‘em. Fight ‘em. Combine all kinds of critters together any way you want. Make never before seen monsters to fit your style.



Welcome to the Weird World of Critter Crosser!
Explore a handmade world teeming with weird monsters and some even weirder people. Critter Crosser blends the thrills of catching, breeding, and battling monsters in real-time.


Key Features:
  • Innovative Breeding System: Breed everything! Combine different monsters to create weird new breeds. Experiment with all kinds of wacky combinations.
  • Monster Collection: Embark on a quest to capture a diverse array of unique monsters. Each creature possesses distinctive abilities and characteristics, providing endless strategies for your journey.
  • Real-Time Combat: Think quick and plan strategically. You won’t be navigating menus once a battle has begun.
  • Small Open World: Explore a fun, hub world filled with secrets and surprises. Traverse through lush forests, creepy caves, and bustling towns.
  • RPG Progression: Customize not only your critters, but also your player, as you level up, learn new skills, and gain new weapons and gear.
  • Low-Stakes Storyline: You won’t save the world, but you might make a difference. The joy is in the journey, not just the destination.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 CPU @ 3.00GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit OS.
